overview.title: Overview
overview.content:
JPG to WebP Converter is a free online tool that converts common JPG format images to highly compressed and high-quality WebP format.
 WebP is an image format developed by Google that can reduce file size by up to 80% compared to JPG. It's ideal for improving web page load speed and optimizing app development. No software installation or complex settings required. Just upload and convert instantly.

items.description: WebP achieves up to 80% compression rate compared to JPG while keeping image degradation to a minimum. By simply converting JPG images to WebP with this tool, you can speed up web display and reduce data transmission.

questions.question: Does image quality decrease when converting to WebP?
questions.answer: No, it's optimized to preserve quality while compressing. The difference is barely noticeable to the human eye.

questions.question: Where is WebP format used?
questions.answer: It's mainly used for speeding up and optimizing image display on websites and apps. It's a next-generation image format recommended by Google.

questions.question: Can I use this on my smartphone?
questions.answer: Yes, you can access and use it on any browser, whether iPhone or Android.

questions.question: Does it support image background transparency?
questions.answer: Since JPG format doesn't have transparency information to begin with, transparency isn't added during WebP conversion. If you need transparency, try using PNG as your source image.

questions.question: Are security and privacy concerns addressed?
questions.answer: Uploaded images are automatically deleted after conversion and not stored on the server. We're mindful of personal information protection.
